sendBody:
By sending your application, you are confirming that:

(I believe) (The applicant(s) believe(s)) that the facts stated in this witness statement are true.

(I understand) (The applicant(s) understand(s)) that proceedings for contempt of court may be brought against anyone who makes, or causes to be made, a false statement in a document verified by a statement of truth without an honest belief in its truth.
